brief_summary: This study was designed to evaluate the safety of the investigational rotavirus vaccine and the efficacy to prevent rotavirus gastroenteritis.
description: 3 doses of 2.0 mL Placebo to RotaTeq administered orally. Dose 1 will be given at study entry, Dose 2 will be given 4-10 weeks after Dose 1, Dose 3 will be given 4-10 weeks after Dose 2.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Healthy infants Exclusion Criteria: - None Specified
